import sys

def generate_next_hexes(x, y):
    hexes = list()
    hexes.append((x, y - 1))
    hexes.append((x, y + 1))
    hexes.append((x - 1, y))
    hexes.append((x + 1, y))
    if y % 2:
        hexes.append((x - 1, y - 1))
        hexes.append((x - 1, y + 1))
    else:
        hexes.append((x + 1, y - 1))
        hexes.append((x + 1, y + 1))
    return hexes

def update_map(hex_map, hexes):
    num_updated_hexes = 0
    distance = 0
    while hexes:
        next_hexes = []
        for pos in hexes:
            x = pos[0]
            y = pos[1]
            if (1 <= x <= m and 1 <= y <= n
                    and (pos not in hex_map or distance < hex_map[pos])):
                hex_map[pos] = distance
                num_updated_hexes += 1
                next_hexes += generate_next_hexes(x, y)
        distance += 1
        hexes = next_hexes
    return num_updated_hexes

loop do
  n = gets.strip.to_i
  break if n == 0

  pts = []
  brd = (MAX_Y + 1).times.map{{}}

  n.times do
    x, y = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}
    pts << [x, y]
    brd[y][x] = true
  end

  npts = pts.length
  max_area = 0

  for i in (0...npts)
    x0, y0 = pts[i]
    for j in ((i + 1)...npts)
      x1, y1 = pts[j]
      dx = x1 - x0
      dy = y1 - y0

      for v in [[-dy, dx], [dy, -dx]]
        x2 = x0 + v[0]
        y2 = y0 + v[1]
        x3 = x1 + v[0]
        y3 = y1 + v[1]

        if x2 >= 0 && x2 <= MAX_X && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= MAX_Y &&
            x3 >= 0 && x3 <= MAX_X && y3 >= 0 && y3 <= MAX_Y &&
            brd[y2][x2] && brd[y3][x3]
          area = dx * dx + dy * dy
          max_area = area if max_area < area
        end
      end
    end
  end

  puts max_area
end

### subroutines

def lower_bound(arr, key, i0 = 0, i1 = arr.length)
  lb = i0 - 1
  ub = i1

  while lb + 1 < ub
    m = (lb + ub) / 2
    if arr[m] <= key
      lb = m
    else
      ub = m
    end
  end
  lb
end

### constants

MAX_INT = 1 << 30

### subroutines

def calc_del_mc(n, tbls)
  sts = [[0, 0]]
  to = {}
  prvs = (n - 1).times.map{{}}

  for i in (0...(n - 1))
    tbli = tbls[i]
    to = {}

    for st in sts
      ti, ci = st

      for tbl in tbli
        xij, yij, cij, tfij = tbl

        if tfij && xij >= ti
          ci0 = ci + cij
          if to[yij].nil?
            to[yij] = [yij, ci0]
            prvs[i][yij] = ti
          elsif to[yij][1] > ci0
            to[yij][1] = ci0
            prvs[i][yij] = ti
          end
        end
      end

      sts = to.values.sort
    end
  end

  min_cost = MAX_INT
  min_yi = nil

  for st in sts
    ti, ci = st
    if min_cost >ci
      min_cost = ci
      min_yi = ti
    end
  end

  return nil if min_yi.nil?

  prv_yi = min_yi
  (n - 2).downto(0) do |i|
    for tbl in tbls[i]
      tbl[3] = false if tbl[1] == prv_yi
    end
    prv_yi = prvs[i][prv_yi]
  end

  min_cost
end

require 'mathn'

def f(x, n, a, i)
  return 1 if x == 0
  return 0 if n == 0
  return 0 if i > a
  if i * i > a
    return x.numerator == 1 && i <= x.denominator && x.denominator <= a.to_i ? 1 : 0
  end
  t = f(x, n, a, i + 1)
  loop do
    x -= 1 / i
    n -= 1
    a /= i
    break if x < 0 || n < 0 || a < 1
    t += f(x, n, a, i + 1)
  end
  t
end

TBL = {'m' => 1000, 'c' => 100, 'x' => 10, 'i' => 1}

### subroutines

def mcxi2num(mcxi)
  pos = 0
  len = mcxi.length
  num = 0

  while pos < len
    ch0 = mcxi[pos]
    pos += 1
    if ch0 >= '0' && ch0 <= '9'
      ch1 = mcxi[pos]
      pos += 1
      num += ch0.to_i * TBL[ch1]
    else
      num += TBL[ch0]
    end
  end
  num
end

def num2mcxi(num)
  dm = num / 1000
  dc = (num % 1000) / 100
  dx = (num % 100) / 10
  di = num % 10

  mcxi = ''
  if dm > 0
    mcxi += dm.to_s if dm > 1
    mcxi += 'm'
  end
  if dc > 0
    mcxi += dc.to_s if dc > 1
    mcxi += 'c'
  end
  if dx > 0
    mcxi += dx.to_s if dx > 1
    mcxi += 'x'
  end
  if di > 0
    mcxi += di.to_s if di > 1
    mcxi += 'i'
  end

  mcxi
end

$vwall = Array.new(30)
$hwall = Array.new(30)
$dx = [0,1,0,-1]
$dy = [1,0,-1,0]
def bfs(sy, sx, steps, q, h, w)
    for i in 0..3
        cy = sy + $dy[i]
        cx = sx + $dx[i]
        if cy.between?(0,h-1) && cx.between?(0,w-1) && steps[cy][cx] ==1000
            if i == 0
                next if sy == h-1 || $hwall[sy][sx] == 1
            elsif i == 1
                next if sx == w-1 || $vwall[sy][sx] == 1
            elsif i == 2
                next if sy == 0 || $hwall[sy-1][sx] == 1
            else
                next if sx == 0 || $vwall[sy][sx-1] == 1
            end
            q.push([cy,cx])
            steps[cy][cx] = steps[sy][sx] + 1
        end
    end
    while q.size > 0
        cy, cx = q.shift
        steps = bfs(cy,cx,steps,q,h,w)
    end
    return steps
end

	for i in range(3, SQRT, 2):

			for j in range(i*i, MAX, i): prime[j] = False

  ais = n.times.map{0}
  g = s

  end  

  if q == 2 || q == 5
    nzs = 0
    count = 0
    for i in (0...n)
      nzs += 1 if ais[i] != 0
      count += nzs if ais[i] % q == 0
    end

    puts count
    next
  end
  
  mds = (n + 1).times.map{0}
  tmd = 1

  (n - 1).downto(0) do |i|
    mds[i] = (ais[i] * tmd + mds[i + 1]) % q
    tmd = (tmd * 10) % q
  end

  chash = Hash.new{0}
  chash[0] = 1
  count = 0
  
  (n - 1).downto(0) do |i|
    mdi = mds[i]
    if ais[i] != 0 && chash.include?(mdi)
      count += chash[mdi]
    end
    chash[mdi] += 1
  end
  
  puts count
end

N, W, D = map(int, input().split())
def calc(x0, y0, dx, dy):
    s = min(W - x0 if dx >= 0 else x0, D - y0 if dy >= 0 else y0)
    x = x0 + dx*s; y = y0 + dy*s
    assert x in [0, W] or y in [0, D], (x, y)
    if y == 0:
        return x
    if x == W:
        return W+y
    if y == D:
        return 2*W+D-x
    return 2*W+2*D-y

S = []
for i in range(N):
    x, y, f = input().split(); x = int(x); y = int(y)
    if f == 'N':
        t1 = calc(x, y, 1, 1)
        t2 = calc(x, y, -1, 1)
    elif f == 'E':
        t1 = calc(x, y, 1, -1)
        t2 = calc(x, y, 1, 1)
    elif f == 'S':
        t1 = calc(x, y, -1, -1)
        t2 = calc(x, y, 1, -1)

def calc(r)
    max_rl = Array.new(N)
    max_r = Array.new(N)
    max_l = Array.new(N)
    deq_up = []
    deq_down = []
    (0..(N-1)).each do |i|
        if !deq_up.empty?
            deq_up.shift if deq_up[0] < i - r
            up_val = @array[i] + i*C
            while !deq_up.empty? && up_val > @array[deq_up[-1]] + deq_up[-1]*C do
                deq_up.pop
            end
        end
        deq_up.push(i)
        max_l[i] = @array[deq_up[0]] - (i-deq_up[0])*C
    end
    (0..(N-1)).to_a.reverse.each do |i|
        if !deq_down.empty?
            deq_down.shift if deq_down[0] > i + r
            down_val = @array[i] - i*C
            while !deq_down.empty? && down_val > @array[deq_down[-1]] - deq_down[-1]*C do
                deq_down.pop
            end
        end
        deq_down.push(i)
        max_r[i] = @array[deq_down[0]] + (i-deq_down[0])*C
    end
    (0..(N-1)).each do |i|
        max_rl[i] = max_l[i] > max_r[i] ? max_l[i] : max_r[i]
    end
    max_rl.inject(:+)
end

def solve():
    N, L = map(int, readline().split())
    if N == 0:
        return False
    ma = 0
    P = [list(map(int, readline().split())) for i in range(N)]
    ma = max(u for s, t, u in P)
    K = 86400
    EPS = 1e-8
    def check(x, M = 2):
        rest = L
        R = [0]*M
        for i in range(M):
            prv = 0
            for s, t, u in P:
                rest = min(rest + (s - prv) * x, L)
                rest = min(rest + (t - s) * (x - u), L)
                prv = t
                if rest < 0:
                    return 0
            rest = min(rest + (K - prv) * x, L)
            R[i] = rest
        return R[-2] - EPS < R[-1]
    left = 0; right = ma
    while left + EPS < right:
        mid = (left + right) / 2
        if check(mid):
            right = mid
        else:
            left = mid
    write("%.016f\n" % right)
    return True

import sys
readline = sys.stdin.readline
write = sys.stdout.write
def solve(t):
    N, T, K = map(int, readline().split())
    if N == T == K == 0:
        return False
    G = [[] for i in range(N)]
    E = []
    res = 0
    for i in range(N-1):
        a, b, c = map(int, readline().split())
        res += c
        E.append((c, a-1, b-1))
    E.sort(reverse=1)
    sz = [0]*N
    for i in range(T):
        v = int(readline())-1
        sz[v] = 1
    *prt, = range(N)
    def root(x):
        if x == prt[x]:
            return x
        prt[x] = y = root(prt[x])
        return y
    def unite(x, y):
        px = root(x); py = root(y)
        if px < py:
            prt[py] = px
            sz[px] += sz[py]
        else:
            prt[px] = py
            sz[py] += sz[px]
    d = T - K - 1
    for c, a, b in E:
        pa = root(a); pb = root(b)
        if sz[pa] == 0 or sz[pb] == 0:
            unite(a, b)
            res -= c
            continue
        if d > 0:
            d -= 1
            unite(a, b)
            res -= c
    write("Case %d: %d\n" % (t, res))
    return True

from collections import deque
import sys
readline = sys.stdin.readline
write = sys.stdout.write
def solve():
    N, M = map(int, readline().split())
    G = [[] for i in range(N)]
    for i in range(M):
        s, t = map(int, readline().split())
        G[s-1].append(t-1)

    used = [0]*N
    cnt = 0
    ans = 0
    for i in range(N):
        if used[i]:
            continue
        que = deque([i])
        used[i] = 1
        while que:
            v = que.popleft()
            ans += len(G[v])-1
            for w in G[v]:
                if used[w]:
                    continue
                used[w] = 1
                que.append(w)
        ans += 1
    write("%d\n" % ans)

def fromAdjRow(xs, n)
  a = []
  1.upto(n) do |i|
    a << i if xs[i-1] == 1
  end
  a
end

def toAdj(g, n)
  g.map do |xs|
    a = [0]*n
    unless xs[1] == 0
      xs[2..-1].each do |x|
        a[x-1] = 1
      end
    end
    a
  end
end

def calc(p1, p2, v):
    dists_v = dists[v]
    if v == n - 1:
        return dists_v[p1] + dists_v[p2]
    if visited[p1][p2]:
        return dp[p1][p2]
    dp[p1][p2] = min(dists_v[p1] + calc(p2, v, v + 1), dists_v[p2] + calc(p1, v, v + 1))
    visited[p1][p2] = True
    return dp[p1][p2]

FACT = [1]
(1..2000).each do |k|
  FACT << FACT[-1] * k % MOD
end

def exp(n, k)
  x = 1
  r = n
  while k > 0
    x *= r if k & 1 == 1
    r *= r
    x %= MOD
    r %= MOD
    k >>= 1
  end
  x
end

def inv(n)
  exp(n, MOD - 2)
end

def perm(n, k)
  n >= k ? FACT[n] * inv(FACT[n - k]) % MOD : 0
end

def comb(n, k)
  perm(n, k) * inv(FACT[k]) % MOD
end

@njit((i8, i8[:, :]), cache=True)
def precompute(N, G):
    ng = np.zeros(N + 10, np.bool_)
    g = np.zeros(N + 1, np.int64)
    ind = np.searchsorted(G[:, 0], np.arange(N + 10))
    for v in range(N - 1, 0, -1):
        for i in range(ind[v], ind[v + 1]):
            w = G[i, 1]
            ng[g[w]] = 1
        for n in range(N + 10):
            if ng[n]:
                continue
            break
        g[v] = n
        for i in range(ind[v], ind[v + 1]):
            w = G[i, 1]
            ng[g[w]] = 0

    B = 10**18 % MOD
    power = 1
    A = np.zeros(1024, np.int64)
    for i in range(1, N + 1):
        power = power * B % MOD
        A[g[i]] += power
    return A % MOD

@njit((i8[:], i8[:]), cache=True)
def convolve(A, B):
    C = np.zeros(1024, np.int64)
    for i in range(1024):
        for j in range(1024):
            C[i ^ j] += A[i] * B[j] % MOD
    return C % MOD

import random
from collections import defaultdict


def solve(n, s, xs, m):
    ans = [10 ** 9] * (n + 1)
    for x in xs:
        p = 0
        h = 0
        y = 1
        r = pow(x, m - 2, m)
        pos = [0] * (n + 1)
        hashes = [0] * (n + 1)
        for i, c in enumerate(s, start=1):
            if c == '>':
                p += 1
                y = y * x % m
            elif c == '<':
                p -= 1
                y = y * r % m
            elif c == '+':
                h = (h + y) % m
            else:
                h = (h - y) % m
            pos[i] = p
            hashes[i] = h

        pow_x = [1]
        for _ in range(max(pos)):
            pow_x.append(pow_x[-1] * x % m)
        mp = min(pos)
        if mp < 0:
            pow_x.append(pow(r, -mp, m))
            for _ in range(-mp - 1):
                pow_x.append(pow_x[-1] * x % m)

        ideal = hashes[-1]
        required = defaultdict(lambda: 0)
        for i, (p, h) in enumerate(zip(pos, hashes)):
            ans[i] = min(ans[i], required[h])
            req = (ideal * pow_x[p] + h) % m
            required[req] += 1

    return sum(ans)

def nCr(n, r, mod):
    if ( r<0 or r>n ):
        return 0
    r = min(r, n-r)
    return g1[n] * g2[r] * g2[n-r] % mod

mod = 998244353 #
size = 10**6 # size >= n
g1 = [1, 1] # 
g2 = [1, 1] #
inverse = [0, 1] #

for i in range( 2, size + 1 ):
    g1.append( ( g1[-1] * i ) % mod )
    inverse.append( ( -inverse[mod % i] * (mod//i) ) % mod )
    g2.append( (g2[-1] * inverse[-1]) % mod )

from numba import njit, b1, i4, i8, f8

read = sys.stdin.buffer.read
readline = sys.stdin.buffer.readline

@njit((i8[:], i8), cache=True)
def get_sum(bit, i):
    s = 0
    while i:
        s += bit[i]
        i -= i & -i
    return s


@njit((i8[:], i8, i8), cache=True)
def add(bit, i, x):
    while i < len(bit):
        bit[i] += x
        i += i & -i

@njit((i8, i8[:]), cache=True)
def main(M, LR):
    L, R = LR[::2], LR[1::2]
    R = R + 1
    D = R - L
    argsort = np.argsort(D)
    L, R, D = L[argsort], R[argsort], D[argsort]
    idx = np.searchsorted(D, np.arange(M + 2))

    bit = np.zeros(M + 10, np.int64)
    rest = len(L)
    for d in range(1, M + 1):
        #  d 
        for i in range(idx[d], idx[d + 1]):
            rest -= 1
            add(bit, L[i], 1)
            add(bit, R[i], -1)
        ans = rest
        for n in range(d, M + 1, d):
            ans += get_sum(bit, n)
        print(ans)

class Heap
	require 'forwardable'
	extend Forwardable

	def initialize
		@array = []
		@index = {}
	end

	def add(obj, key)
		@array << [obj, key]
		@index[obj] = @array.size - 1
		lift_up(@array.size - 1)
	end

	def swap(i, j)
		u = @array[i]
		v = @array[j]
		@index[u[0]], @index[v[0]] = j, i
		@array[i], @array[j] = v, u
	end

	def lift_up(i)
		return if i == 0
		j = (i - 1) / 2
		if @array[i][1] < @array[j][1]
			swap(i, j)
			lift_up(j)
		end
	end

	def del_min
		raise "heap is empty!" if empty?
		min = @array[0]
		if size > 1
			swap(0, @array.size-1)
			@array.pop
			lift_down(0)
		else
			@array.pop
		end
		@index.delete(min[0])
		min
	end

	def inc_key(obj, diff)
		i = @index[obj]
		@array[i][1] += diff
		lift_down(i)
	end

	def dec_key(obj, diff)
		i = @index[obj]
		@array[i][1] -= diff
		lift_up(i)
	end

	def update_key(obj, new_key)
		i = @index[obj]
		return unless i
		return if new_key >= @array[i][1]
		@array[i][1] = new_key
		lift_up(i)
	end

	def min_obj
		@array[0][0]
	end

	def min_key
		@array[0][1]
	end

	def lift_down(i)
		j = 2 * i + 1
		k = j + 1
		if k >= size
			return if j >= size
			if @array[i][1] > @array[j][1]
				swap(i, j)
				lift_down(j)
			end
		else
			l = (@array[j][1] < @array[k][1] ? j : k)
			if @array[i][1] > @array[l][1]
				swap(i, l)
				lift_down(l)
			end
		end
	end

	def_delegators :@array, :empty?, :size
end

module Graphical
	require 'set'

	def reachable_from(s, max_depth = nil)
		reached = Set[s]
		queue = [s]
		depth = 0
		loop {
			break if max_depth && depth >= max_depth
			next_queue = []
			until queue.empty?
				u = queue.shift
				each_out_connection_of(u){|v, _|
					next if reached.include?(v)
					reached << v
					next_queue << v
				}
			end
			break if next_queue.empty?
			queue = next_queue
			depth += 1
		}
		return reached
	end

	def dijkstra(start)
		h = Heap.new
		reached = Set[start]
		h.add(start, 0)

		dist = {}
		until h.empty?
			u, key = h.del_min
			return key if block_given? && yield(u, key)
			dist[u] = key
			each_out_connection_of(u){|v, l|
				d = dist[u] + l
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, d)
				else
					h.add(v, d)
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		block_given? ? nil : dist
	end

	def bidir_dijkstra(s, ts)
		f_dist = {}
		b_dist = {}

		f_heap = Heap.new
		b_heap = Heap.new

		f_heap.add(s, 0)
		ts.each{|t|
			b_heap.add(t, 0)
		}

		f_reached = Set[s]
		b_reached = Set[*ts]

		f_current_dist = b_current_dist = 0
		best = Float::INFINITY

		loop {
			if !f_heap.empty?
				u, key = f_heap.del_min
				f_dist[u] = key
				f_current_dist = key
				each_out_connection_of(u){|v, l|
					d = f_dist[u] + l
					if b_dist[v]
						path_len = d + b_dist[v]
						best = path_len if path_len < best
					end
					if f_reached.include?(v)
						f_heap.update_key(v, d)
					else
						f_heap.add(v, d)
						f_reached << v
					end
				}
			end

			if !b_heap.empty?
				u, key = b_heap.del_min
				b_dist[u] = key
				b_current_dist = key
				each_in_connection_of(u){|v, l|
					d = b_dist[u] + l
					if f_dist[v]
						path_len = d + f_dist[v]
						best = path_len if path_len < best
					end
					if b_reached.include?(v)
						b_heap.update_key(v, d)
					else
						b_heap.add(v, d)
						b_reached << v
					end
				}
			end

			return best if f_current_dist + b_current_dist >= best
			return nil if f_heap.empty? && b_heap.empty?
		}
	end

	def prim(start)
		h = Heap.new
		h.add(start, 0)
		reached = Set[start]
		tree_len = 0

		until h.empty?
			u, key = h.del_min
			tree_len += key

			each_connection_of(u){|v, d|
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, d)
				else
					h.add(v, d)
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		tree_len
	end
end

class Graph
	include Graphical

	def initialize(*options)
		@options = Set[*options]
	end

	def add_node(property = {})
		Node.new(property)
	end

	def add_edge(u, v, property = {})
		e = Edge.new(u, v, property)
		u.add_edge(e)
		v.add_edge(e)
		e
	end
	
	def del_edge(e)
		u, v = e.from, e.to
		u.del_edge(e)
		v.del_edge(e)
		e
	end

	class Node
		def initialize(property)
			@property = property
			@edges = Set.new
		end

		def add_edge(e)
			@edges << e
		end

		def del_edge(e)
			@edges.delete(e)
		end

		def to_s
			@property[:name] || super
		end

		def each_edge
			@edges.each{|e| 
				yield e
			}
		end

		attr_reader :property
	end

	class Edge
		def initialize(u, v, property)
			@opposite = {u => v, v => u}
			@property = property
		end
		attr_reader :opposite, :property

		def to_s
			@property[:name] || super
		end

		def length
			@property[:length] || 1
		end
	end

	def each_out_connection_of(u)
		u.each_edge{|e|
			yield(e.opposite[u], e.length)
		}
	end

	alias :each_in_connection_of :each_out_connection_of
end

loop {

	start, goal = gets.split.map &:to_i

	$g = Graph.new
	$nodes = (0..n).map {|i| $g.add_node({:index => i, :name => i}) }
	$limit = {}
	m.times {
		i, j, d, c = gets.split.map &:to_i
		$g.add_edge($nodes[i], $nodes[j], {:length => d, :limit => c, :name => "#{i}-#{j}"})
	}

		puts 'unreachable'
		next
	end

	$hoge = $nodes[start]

	extend Graphical
	def each_out_connection_of(a)
		u, used_edge, speed = a
		u.each_edge{|e|
			next if e == used_edge
			v = e.opposite[u]
			[speed-1, speed, speed+1].each{|next_speed|
				next if next_speed <= 0
				yield([v, e, next_speed], e.length / next_speed.to_f) if next_speed <= e.property[:limit]
			}
		}
	end

	def each_in_connection_of(a)
		w, used_edge, speed = a
		v = used_edge.opposite[w]
		v.each_edge{|e|
			next if e == used_edge
			u = e.opposite[v]
			[speed-1, speed, speed+1].each{|prev_speed|
				next if prev_speed <= 0
				yield([v, e, prev_speed], used_edge.length / speed.to_f) if prev_speed <= e.property[:limit]
			}
		}
		if v == $hoge && speed == 1
			yield([$hoge, nil, 0], used_edge.length / speed.to_f)
		end
	end

	goals = []
	$nodes[goal].each_edge{|e|
		goals << [$nodes[goal], e, 1]
	}

	t = bidir_dijkstra([$nodes[start], nil, 0], goals) 
	printf("%.7f\n", t);
}

def comp(a, b)

	h0, w0 = a
	h1, w1 = b

	if h0**2 + w0**2 != h1**2 + w1**2
		h0**2 + w0**2 < h1**2 + w1**2
	else
		h0 < h1
	end

end

def solve(h, w)

	array = []

	(1..150).each do |x|
		((x+1)..150).each do |y|
			array.push([x,y])
		end
	end

	array.sort! { |a,b|
		if(comp(a,b))
			-1
		elsif(comp(b,a))
			1
		else
			0
		end
	}

	array.length.times do |i|
		if array[i] == [h,w]
			return array[i+1]
		end
	end

def parse_num(str)
  num = 0
  while str[$pos] >= '0' && str[$pos] <= '9'
    num = num * 10 + str[$pos].to_i
    $pos += 1
  end
  num
end

def parse(str)
  return 'N/A' if str[$pos] != '['
  $pos += 1

  if str[$pos] >= '0' && str[$pos] <= '9'
    num = parse_num(str)
    $pos += 1
    return (num + 1) / 2
  end

  ds = []
  nds = 0
  while str[$pos] == '['
    ds << parse(str)
    nds += 1
  end
  $pos += 1
  
  ds.sort[0..(nds / 2)].inject(:+)
end

# <mol> := <atom> | <atom> <num> | '(' <mol> ')' <num> | <mol> <mol>
# <atom> := [A-Z] | [A-Z][a-z]
# <num> := [0-9]+

def mol(str)
  #p "mol"
  m = 0

  while str[$pos] && str[$pos] != ')'
    if str[$pos] >= 'A' && str[$pos] <= 'Z'
      a = atom(str)
      return nil if a.nil?
      if str[$pos] && str[$pos] >= '0' && str[$pos] <= '9'
        n = num(str)
        a *= n
      end
      m += a
    elsif str[$pos] == '('
      $pos += 1
      m0 = mol(str)
      return nil if m0.nil?
      $pos += 1
      n = num(str)
      m += m0 * n
    end
  end

  m
end

def atom(str)
  #p "atom"
  at = str[$pos]
  $pos += 1
  if str[$pos] && str[$pos] >= 'a' && str[$pos] <= 'z'
    at += str[$pos]
    $pos += 1
  end
  $atbl[at]
end

def num(str)
  #p "num"
  n = 0
  while str[$pos] && str[$pos] >= '0' && str[$pos] <= '9'
    n = n * 10 + str[$pos].to_i
    $pos += 1
  end
  n
end

    pow_mem1[x] = my_pow1(x - 1) * 27 % mod1
    return pow_mem1[x]

  def my_pow2(x):
    if x in pow_mem2:return pow_mem2[x]

def knapsack(items, budget)
    table = (0..1).map{ Array.new(budget+1, 0) }
    for i in 0..items.size-1
        c, v = items[i]
        for j in 0..budget
            x = table[0][j]
            y = (j >= c ? table[0][j-c] + v : 0)
            table[1][j] = x > y ? x : y 
        end
        table << table.shift
    end 
    table[0][budget]
end

    elsif read_time[-1] * 2 > read_time.inject(:+)  
        t1 = read_time.pop
        t2 = read_time.inject(:+)
        space = t1 - t2
        t3 = knapsack(write_time[0..-2].map{|x| [x, x]}, space)
        p 2 * t1 + write_time.inject(:+) - t3
    else
        p read_time.inject(:+) + write_time.inject(:+)
    end 
end

# Algorithms {{{

def lower_bound(arr, val)
  assert(arr.is_a?(Array))
  low, high = 0, arr.size
  while high - low > 1
    mid = (low + high) / 2
    if arr[mid] < val
      low = mid
    else
      high = mid
    end
  end
  if arr[low] >= val
    low
  else
    high
  end
end

def upper_bound(arr, val)
  assert(arr.is_a?(Array))
  low, high = 0, arr.size
  while high - low > 1
    mid = (low + high) / 2
    if arr[mid] <= val
      low = mid
    else
      high = mid
    end
  end
  if arr[low] > val
    low
  else
    high
  end
end

while true
  n = io.int
  break if n == 0
  bigger_chars = Hash.new { |h, k| h[k] = Set.new }
  prev_word = ''
  ok = true
  n.times do |i|
    word = io.gets
    [prev_word.length, word.length].min.times do |j|
      if prev_word[j] == word[j]
        next
      elsif bigger_chars[word[j]].include?(prev_word[j])
        ok = false and break
      else
        bigger_chars[prev_word[j]] << word[j]
        # Update dependencies
        ('a'..'z').each do |c|
          q = bigger_chars[c].to_a
          while !q.empty?
            tc = q.pop
            bigger_chars[c] << tc
            q += (bigger_chars[tc] - bigger_chars[c]).to_a
          end
        end
        break
      end
    end
    if prev_word.start_with?(word) && prev_word != word
      ok = false
    end
    prev_word = word
  end
  io.puts ok ? 'yes' : 'no'
end

$history = {}

class Goal < Exception; end
class Loop < Exception; end

$count = 0

def dummy(id)
	raise Goal if $x == $gx && $y == $gy
	a = [$x, $y, $dx, $dy, id]
	raise Loop if $history[a]
	$history[a] = 1
end

def check(id)
	raise Goal if $x == $gx && $y == $gy
	a = [$x, $y, $dx, $dy, id]
	raise Loop if $history[a]
	$history[a] = 1
	$count += 1
end 

def wall
	$a[$y + $dy][$x + $dx] == ?#
end

def north
	$dx == 0 && $dy == -1
end

def south
	$dx == 0 && $dy == 1
end

def east
	$dx == 1 && $dy == 0
end

def west
	$dx == -1 && $dy == 0
end

def right(id)
	check(id)
	$dx, $dy = -$dy, $dx
end

def left(id)
	check(id)
	$dx, $dy = $dy, -$dx
end

def forward(id)
	check(id)
	unless wall 
		$x += $dx
		$y += $dy
	end
end

def backward(id)
	check(id)
	unless $a[$y - $dy][$x - $dx] == ?#
		$x -= $dx
		$y -= $dy
	end
end

def bubble_sort(a, n)
  0.upto(n-2){|i|
    (n-1).downto(i+1){|j|
      if number(a[j]) < number(a[j-1])
        t=a[j];a[j]=a[j-1];a[j-1]=t
      end
    }
  }
end

def selection_sort(a, n)
  n.times{|i|
    m=i
    i.upto(n-1){|j|
      m = j if number(a[j]) < number(a[m])
    }
    t=a[i];a[i]=a[m];a[m]=t
  }
end

class QuickUnion
  attr :id

  def initialize(n)
    @id = (0...n).to_a
  end

  def root(i)
    while i != @id[i] do
      i = @id[i]
    end
    i
  end

  # find, check if p and q has the same root
  def same?(p, q)
    root(p) == root(q)
  end

  # union, to merge components containing p and q
  # set id of p's root to the id of q's root
  def unite(p, q)
    i = root(p)
    j = root(q)
    @id[i] = j
  end
end

def add(a, w)
  while a <= $n
    $d[a] += w
    a += a & -a
  end
end

def sum(i)
  ret = 0
  x = i
  while x > 0
    ret += $d[x]
    x -= x & -x
  end
  return ret
end

# Disjoint Set Union
class DSU
  def initialize(n = 0)
    # root node: -1 * component size
    # otherwise: parent
    @n = n
    @parent_or_size = Array.new(n, -1)
  end

  def merge(a, b)
    x = leader(a)
    y = leader(b)
    return x if x == y

    x, y = y, x if -@parent_or_size[x] < -@parent_or_size[y]
    @parent_or_size[x] += @parent_or_size[y]
    @parent_or_size[y] = x
    x
  end

  def same(a, b)
    leader(a) == leader(b)
  end

  def leader(a)
    @parent_or_size[a].negative? ? a : (@parent_or_size[a] = leader(@parent_or_size[a]))
  end

  def size(a)
    -@parent_or_size[leader(a)]
  end

  def groups
    leader_buf = Array.new(@n, 0)
    group_size = Array.new(@n, 0)
    (0...@n).each do |i|
      leader_buf[i] = leader(i)
      group_size[leader_buf[i]] += 1
    end
    result = Array.new(@n) { [] }
    (0...@n).each do |i|
      result[leader_buf[i]].push i
    end
    result.delete_if(&:empty?)
    result
  end

  alias root leader
  alias find leader
  alias unite merge
  alias same? same
end

#!/usr/bin/env python3
def main():
    import numpy as np

    N = int(input())
    testimony = np.zeros((N, N), dtype=np.int64)
    for i in range(N):
        A = int(input())
        INF = 10 ** 10
        for _ in range(A):
            x, y = map(int, input().split())
            testimony[i, x - 1] += 1 if y else -INF

    # bit
    ans = 0
    for bit in range(1 << N):
        honest = set()
        pick = np.zeros(N, dtype=np.int64)
        for i in range(N):
            if bit & (1 << i):
                honest.add(i)
                pick += testimony[i, :]
        flag = True
        for j in range(N):
            value = pick[j]
            # 31.
            if (0
                    or (j in honest and value < 0)         # 
                    or (j not in honest and value > 0)     # 
                    or (value < 0 and value % INF != 0)):  # 
                flag = False
                break
        if flag:
            ans = max(ans, len(honest))
    print(ans)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def match(data,sample,y,x)
    h = sample.length
    w = sample[0].length 
    return false if h+y > 8
    return false if w+x > 8
    for i in 0..h-1 do
        for j in 0..w-1 do
            return false if data[y+i][x+j]!=sample[i][j]
        end
    end
    true
end

def delete(field, x, y)
  field[y][x] = "0"
  [[1, 0], [0, -1], [-1, 0], [0, 1]].each do |dx, dy|
    x1 = x + dx
    y1 = y + dy
    if !(x1 < 0 or x1 >= L or y1 < 0 or y1 >= L) and field[y1][x1] == "1"
      delete(field, x1, y1)
    end
  end
end

class Node
  attr_accessor :go, :come

  def initialize(id)
    @id = id
    @go = []
    @come = []
  end

  def to_s
    "[#{@id}]"
  end

  def inspect
    to_s
  end
end

class Arrow
  attr_accessor :source, :sink, :label
  
  def initialize(source, sink, label)
    @source = source
    @sink = sink
    @label = label
    source.go << self
    source.come << self
  end
  
  def to_s
    "#{source}-#{label}->#{sink}"
  end

  def inspect
    to_s
  end
end

class Result
  attr_accessor :target, :spell

  def initialize(target, spell)
    @target = target
    @spell = spell
  end

  def to_s
    "#{target}: #{spell}"
  end

  def inspect
    to_s
  end
end

def advance(table, nodes, arrows)
  next_table = {}
  nodes.each do |node|
    best = table[node]
    arrows.each do |arrow|
      next unless arrow.source == node
      result = table[arrow.sink]
      next unless result
      test = Result.new(arrow.sink, arrow.label + result.spell)
      if !best || test.spell < best.spell
        best = test
      end
    end
    next_table[node] = best if best
  end
  next_table
end

def check(table, node)
  used = {}
  loop do
    result = table[node]
    return false unless result
    node = result.target
    return true unless node
    return false if used[node]
    used[node] = true
  end
end

def work(nodes, arrows, start, goal)
  table = {goal => Result.new(nil, '')}
  (nodes.size*7).times do
    table = advance(table, nodes, arrows)
  end
  puts check(table, start) ? table[start].spell : 'NO'
end

from heapq import heappush, heappop
from collections import deque
import sys
readline = sys.stdin.readline
write = sys.stdout.write
def solve():
    W, H, N = map(int, readline().split())
    if W == H == N == 0:
        return False
    MP = [[0]*W for i in range(H)]

    S = [(i-2, i-2) for i in range(3)]
    T = [(i-2, i-2) for i in range(3)]
    for i in range(H):
        s = readline().strip()
        for j, c in enumerate(s):
            if c == '#':
                MP[i][j] = 1
            elif c != ' ':
                idx = "abcABC".find(c)
                if idx < 3:
                    S[idx] = (j, i)
                else:
                    T[idx-3] = (j, i)

    dd = ((-1, 0), (0, -1), (1, 0), (0, 1))
    que = deque([S[0] + (0,)])
    MM = {S[0]: 0, (-1, -1): -2, (0, 0): -1}
    sx, sy = S[0]
    U = [[0]*W for i in range(H)]
    U[sy][sx] = 1
    G = [[0]]
    cur = 1
    while que:
        x, y, v = que.popleft()
        for dx, dy in dd:
            nx = x + dx; ny = y + dy
            if MP[ny][nx] or U[ny][nx]:
                continue
            U[ny][nx] = 1
            MM[nx, ny] = cur
            que.append((nx, ny, cur))
            G.append([cur, v])
            G[v].append(cur)
            cur += 1
    MM[-1, -1] = len(G); G.append([len(G)])
    MM[0, 0] = len(G); G.append([len(G)])
    a0 = MM[S[0]]; b0 = MM[S[1]]; c0 = MM[S[2]]
    a1 = MM[T[0]]; b1 = MM[T[1]]; c1 = MM[T[2]]

    L = cur+2
    def check(s):
        que = deque([s])
        D = [-1]*L
        D[s] = 0
        while que:
            v = que.popleft()
            nd = D[v]+1
            for w in G[v]:
                if D[w] != -1:
                    continue
                D[w] = nd
                que.append(w)
        return D

    D1 = check(a1); D2 = check(b1); D3 = check(c1)
    INF = 10**18

    hcost = max(D1[a0], D2[b0], D3[c0])
    D = {(a0, b0, c0): 0}
    que = [(hcost, 0, a0, b0, c0)]
    g_key = (a1, b1, c1)
    push = heappush; pop = heappop
    while que:
        hcost, cost, a, b, c = pop(que)
        key = (a, b, c)
        if key == g_key:
            break
        if D[key] < cost:
            continue
        nd = cost+1
        for na in G[a]:
            d1 = D1[na]
            for nb in G[b]:
                if na == nb or (nb == a and na == b):
                    continue
                d2 = D2[nb]
                for nc in G[c]:
                    if na == nc or nb == nc or (nc == a and na == c) or (nc == b and nb == c):
                        continue
                    n_key = (na, nb, nc)
                    if nd < D.get(n_key, INF):
                        D[n_key] = nd
                        hcost = max(d1, d2, D3[nc]) + nd
                        push(que, (hcost, nd, na, nb, nc))
    write("%d\n" % D[g_key])
    return True

def dfs(k,r,l,p,e,t)
    return 0 if r > t + e || l < t - e
    return 1 if t - e <= r && l <= t + e
    h = (r.to_f + l.to_f)/2
    if k == 0
        return 1 if h.between?(t - e, t + e)
        return 0
    end
    ret = 0
    if h >= t
        ret += (1 - p) * dfs(k-1,r,h,p,e,t)
        ret += p * dfs(k-1,h,l,p,e,t)
    else
        ret += (1 - p) * dfs(k-1,h,l,p,e,t)
        ret += p * dfs(k-1,r,h,p,e,t)
    end
    return ret
end

module Graphical
	require 'set'

	def reachable_from(s, max_depth = nil)
		reached = Set[s]
		queue = [s]
		depth = 0
		loop {
			break if max_depth && depth >= max_depth
			next_queue = []
			until queue.empty?
				u = queue.shift
				each_out_connection_of(u){|v, _|
					next if reached.include?(v)
					reached << v
					next_queue << v
				}
			end
			break if next_queue.empty?
			queue = next_queue
			depth += 1
		}
		return reached
	end

	def bfs(start)
		raise "start must be Enumerable" if !start.kind_of?(Enumerable)
		reached = Set[*start.to_a]
		queue = []
		start.each{|s| queue << s}
		dist = {}
		loop.with_index {|_, depth|
			next_queue = []
			until queue.empty?
				u = queue.shift
				return depth if block_given? && yield(u, depth)
				dist[u] = depth
				each_out_connection_of(u){|v, _|
					next if reached.include?(v)
					reached << v
					next_queue << v
				}
			end
			break if next_queue.empty?
			queue = next_queue
		}
		return dist
	end

	def dijkstra(start)
		raise "start must be Enumerable" if !start.kind_of?(Enumerable)
		h = Heap.new
		reached = Set[*start.to_a]
		start.each{|s| h.add(s, 0)}

		dist = {}
		until h.empty?
			u, key = h.del_min
			return key if block_given? && yield(u, key)
			dist[u] = key
			each_out_connection_of(u){|v, l|
				d = dist[u] + l
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, d)
				else
					h.add(v, d)
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		block_given? ? nil : dist
	end

	def bidir_dijkstra(s, t)
		f_dist = {}
		b_dist = {}

		f_heap = Heap.new
		b_heap = Heap.new

		f_heap.add(s, 0)
		b_heap.add(t, 0)

		f_reached = Set[s]
		b_reached = Set[t]

		f_current_dist = b_current_dist = 0
		best = Float::INFINITY

		loop {
			if !f_heap.empty?
				u, key = f_heap.del_min
				f_dist[u] = key
				f_current_dist = key
				each_out_connection_of(u){|v, l|
					d = f_dist[u] + l
					if b_dist[v]
						path_len = d + b_dist[v]
						best = path_len if path_len < best
					end
					if f_reached.include?(v)
						f_heap.update_key(v, d)
					else
						f_heap.add(v, d)
						f_reached << v
					end
				}
			end

			if !b_heap.empty?
				u, key = b_heap.del_min
				b_dist[u] = key
				b_current_dist = key
				each_in_connection_of(u){|v, l|
					d = b_dist[u] + l
					if f_dist[v]
						path_len = d + f_dist[v]
						best = path_len if path_len < best
					end
					if b_reached.include?(v)
						b_heap.update_key(v, d)
					else
						b_heap.add(v, d)
						b_reached << v
					end
				}
			end

			return best if f_current_dist + b_current_dist >= best
			return nil if f_heap.empty? && b_heap.empty?
		}
	end

	def a_star(start)
		raise "a_star need termination condition" unless block_given?
		h = Heap.new
		reached = Set[start]
		h.add(start, [a_star_heuristic(start), 0])

		dist = {}
		until h.empty?
			u, (e, d) = h.del_min
			return d if yield(u, dist)
			dist[u] = d
			each_out_connection_of(u){|v, l|
				d = dist[u] + l
				e = d + a_star_heuristic(v)
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, [e, d])
				else
					h.add(v, [e, d])
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		block_given? ? nil : dist
	end

	#make_variations :bidir_dijkstra

	def prim(start)
		h = Heap.new
		h.add(start, 0)
		reached = Set[start]
		tree_len = 0

		until h.empty?
			u, key = h.del_min
			tree_len += key

			each_connection_of(u){|v, d|
				if reached.include?(v)
					h.update_key(v, d)
				else
					h.add(v, d)
					reached << v
				end
			}
		end
		tree_len
	end

	def each_layer_from(start)
		raise "start must be Enumerable" if !start.kind_of?(Enumerable)
		return enum_for(__method__, start) unless block_given?
		reached = Set[*start]
		current_layer = start

		loop {
			yield current_layer
			next_layer = []
			current_layer.each{|u|
				each_out_connection_of(u){|v|
					next if reached.include?(v)
					reached << v
					next_layer << v
				}
			}	

			return if next_layer.empty?
			current_layer = next_layer
		}
	end
end

class Graph
	include Graphical

	def initialize(*options)
		@options = Set[*options]
	end

	def add_node(property = {})
		Node.new(property)
	end

	def add_edge(u, v, property = {})
		e = Edge.new(u, v, property)
		u.add_edge(e)
		v.add_edge(e)
		e
	end
	
	def del_edge(e)
		u, v = e.opposite.keys
		u.del_edge(e)
		v.del_edge(e)
		e
	end

	class Node
		def initialize(property)
			@property = property
			@edges = Set.new
		end

		def add_edge(e)
			@edges << e
		end

		def del_edge(e)
			@edges.delete(e)
		end

		def to_s
			@property[:name] || super
		end

		def each_edge
			@edges.each{|e| 
				yield e
			}
		end

		attr_reader :property
	end

	class Edge
		def initialize(u, v, property)
			@opposite = {u => v, v => u}
			@property = property
		end
		attr_reader :opposite, :property

		def to_s
			@property[:name] || super
		end

		def length
			@property[:length] || 1
		end
	end

	def each_out_connection_of(u)
		u.each_edge{|e|
			yield(e.opposite[u], e.length)
		}
	end

	alias :each_in_connection_of :each_out_connection_of
end

class Digraph < Graph
	def add_node(property = {})
		Node.new(property)
	end

	def add_edge(u, v, property = {})
		e = Edge.new(u, v, property)
		u.add_out_edge(e)
		v.add_in_edge(e)
		e
	end
	
	def del_edge(e)
		u, v = e.from, e.to
		u.out_edges.delete(e)
		v.in_edges.delete(e)
		e
	end

	class Node < Graph::Node
		def initialize(property)
			@property = property
			@out_edges = Set.new
			@in_edges = Set.new
		end

		def add_out_edge(e)
			@out_edges << e
		end

		def del_out_edge(e)
			@out_edges.delete(e)
		end

		def add_in_edge(e)
			@in_edges << e
		end

		def del_in_edge(e)
			@in_edges.delete(e)
		end

		attr_reader :in_edges, :out_edges
	end

	class Edge < Graph::Edge
		def initialize(u, v, property)
			@from = u	
			@to = v
			@property = property
		end

		attr_reader :from, :to
	end

	def each_out_connection_of(u)
		u.out_edges.each{|e|
			yield [e.to, e.length]
		}
	end

	def each_in_connection_of(v)
		v.in_edges.each{|e|
			yield [e.from, e.length]
		}
	end

#----------------------------------------------------------

	def get_path_bfs(s, t)
		path_edge = {}
		reached = Set[s]
		queue = [s]
		while !queue.empty? 
			u = queue.shift
			u.outgoings.each{|e|
				v = e.to
				next if reached.include?(v)	
				reached << v
				queue << v
				path_edge[v] = e

				if v == t
					path = []
					while e = path_edge[v]
						path.unshift e
						v = e.from
					end
					return path
				end
			}
		end	
		return nil
	end

	def get_path_dfs(s, t, reached = Set.new)
		reached << s	
		s.outgoings.each{|e|
			v = e.to
			next if reached.include?(v)
			return [e] if v == t
			
			path = get_path_dfs(v, t, reached) 
			return [e] + path if path
		}
		nil
	end

end

class SparseMatrix
	def initialize(m, n)
		@m, @n = m, n
		@rows = (1..m).map{ Hash.new(0) }
	end

	def [](i)
		@rows[i]
	end

	def rank
		rank = 0
		j = 0
		(0..@m-1).each{|i|
			pivot_idx = nil
			j += 1 until j >= @n || pivot_idx = @rows.index{|row| row[j] && row[j] != 0}
			break if j >= @n
			rank += 1

			pivot_row = @rows.delete_at(pivot_idx)
			a = pivot_row[j]
			
			@rows.each{|row|
				b = row[j]
				if b && b != 0
					r = b / a
					pivot_row.each{|k, val|
						row[k] -= r * val
						row.delete(k) if row[k] == 0
					}
				end
			}

			j += 1
		}		
		rank
	end
end

class Puzzle
  def initialize(state, direction, count=-1)
    @state = state
    @count = count
    @direction = direction
  end

  def calc_number
    nums = @state.dup
    @state.each_with_index do |x, i_x|
      @state[i_x..-1].each_with_index do |y, i_y|
        nums[i_x + i_y] -= 1 if y > x
      end
    end

    number = 0
    nums.each_with_index do |x, i_x|
      factorial = (nums.size - 1 - i_x).downto(1).inject(:*)
      number += factorial * x if factorial != nil
    end
    return number
  end

  def find_zero
    return @state.index(0)
  end

  def print_puzzle
    puts state[0..2].join(' ')
    puts state[3..5].join(' ')
    puts state[6..8].join(' ')
  end

  attr_accessor :state, :count, :direction
end

class Dictionary
  def initialize(num)
    @visited_dict = Array.new(num, 1)
    @count_dict = Array.new(num, 0)
  end

  attr_reader :visited_dict, :count_dict

  def visited?(index, direction)
    return @visited_dict[index] != 1 && @visited_dict[index] % direction == 0
  end

  def visit(puzzle)
    index = puzzle.calc_number
    direction = puzzle.direction
    count = puzzle.count
    @visited_dict[index] *= direction
    @count_dict[index] += count
  end

  def get_count(puzzle)
    return count_dict[puzzle.calc_number]
  end
end

class Tree
    attr_accessor :key, :left, :right
    def initialize(k, l, r)
        @key   = k
        @left  = l
        @right = r
    end
end

def insert(x, tree)
    if tree == nil
        Tree.new(x, nil, nil)
    elsif x < tree.key
        Tree.new(tree.key, insert(x, tree.left), tree.right)
    elsif x > tree.key
        Tree.new(tree.key, tree.left, insert(x, tree.right))
    else
        tree
    end
end

def find(x, tree)
    if tree == nil then
        false
    elsif x < tree.key
        find(x, tree.left)
    elsif x > tree.key
        find(x, tree.right)
    else
        true
    end
end

def delete(x, tree)
    ps = []
    xs = []

    #-- ()
    while x != tree.key
        if x < tree.key
            tree, ps, xs = goleft(tree, ps, xs)
        else
            tree, ps, xs = goright(tree, ps, xs)
        end
    end

    #-- 
    tree = minswap(tree)

    #-- 
    while ps != []
        tree, ps, xs = goup(tree, ps, xs)
    end

    tree
end

def minswap(tree)
    #-- tree
    #-- 
    directions = []
    breadcrambs = []

    if tree.left == nil && tree.right != nil
        tree = tree.right
    elsif tree.left != nil && tree.right == nil
        tree = tree.left
    elsif tree.left != nil && tree.right != nil
        tree, directions, breadcrambs = goright(tree, directions, breadcrambs)
        while tree.left != nil
            tree, directions, breadcrambs = goleft(tree, directions, breadcrambs)
        end
        swapkey = tree.key
        tree = tree.right
        while directions != []
            tree, directions, breadcrambs = goup(tree, directions, breadcrambs)
        end
        tree.key = swapkey
    else
        tree = nil
    end

    tree
end

def goleft(tree, directions, breadcrambs)
    rt = tree.left
    tree.left = nil
    directions << 'L'
    breadcrambs << tree
    [rt, directions, breadcrambs]
end

def goright(tree, directions, breadcrambs)
    rt = tree.right
    tree.right = nil
    directions << 'R'
    breadcrambs << tree
    [rt, directions, breadcrambs]
end

def goup(tree, directions, breadcrambs)
    d = directions[-1]
    xtree = breadcrambs[-1]
    if d == 'L' then xtree.left = tree
    else xtree.right = tree end
    [xtree, directions[0..-2], breadcrambs[0..-2]]
end

def preorder(tree)
    if tree != nil
        print " #{tree.key}"
        preorder(tree.left)
        preorder(tree.right)
    end
end

def inorder(tree)
    if tree != nil
        inorder(tree.left)
        print " #{tree.key}"
        inorder(tree.right)
    end
end

def postorder(tree)
    if tree != nil
        postorder(tree.left)
        postorder(tree.right)
        print " #{tree.key}"
    end
end

## Loop version
def f(i, j, g)
  return $m[j][1] + g[i].child[j] if $m[j] && $m[j][0] != i
  unless $known[i][j]
    stack = [i, j]
    max = {}
    done = {}
    done[i] = true
    max[i] = 0
    while stack.size > 1
      s = stack[-2]
      t = stack[-1]
      max[t] ||= 0
      unless $known[s][t]
        flag = true
        g[t].child.each{|u, w|
          next if done[u]
          next if s == u
          done[u] = true
          if $known[t][u]
            max[t] = $known[t][u] if max[t] < $known[t][u]
          else
            stack << u
            flag = false
            break
          end
        }
        if flag
          $known[s][t] = g[s].child[t] + max[t]
          max[s] = $known[s][t] if max[s] < $known[s][t]
          stack.pop
        end
      else
        max[s] = $known[s][t] if  max[s] < $known[s][t]
        stack.pop
      end
    end
  end
  return $known[i][j]
end

// Lunlun Number

func main() {
    let k = Int(readLine()!)!
    var rest = k - 9

    var lunlun: [[Int]] = []

    var digits = 0
    lunlun.append([1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9])
    var count = 9

    while count < k {
        var currentLunlun: [Int] = []
        for i in lunlun[digits] {
            let lastNumber = i % 10
            switch lastNumber {
            case 0:
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber)
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber + 1)
            case 9:
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber - 1)
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber)
            default:
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber - 1)
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber)
                currentLunlun.append(i * 10 + lastNumber + 1)
            }
        }

        if rest <= currentLunlun.count {
            print(currentLunlun[rest-1])
            return
        }
        rest -= currentLunlun.count
        lunlun.append(currentLunlun)
        count += currentLunlun.count
        digits += 1
    }
    print(lunlun[0][k-1])
}

def dfs(start, goal, g, pre)
  stack = [ [start, 0, pre] ]
  #stack = [, , ]
  catch(:loop) do
    while stack.length > 0 do
      current = stack.pop
      #
      if current[0] == goal
        @path = current[1]
        throw :loop
      end
      g[ current[0] ].each do |p|
        #
        next if p[0] == current[2]
        #
        bit = current[1] | (1 << p[1])
        stack.push([p[0], bit, current[0]])
      end
    end
  end
end

    end

  end

class PriorityQueue
  attr_accessor(:node)
  
  def initialize(src = [])
    @node = []
    src.each do |e|
      push(e)
    end
  end

  def push(x)
    @node << x
    bottom_up
  end

  def pop
    res = @node.first
    top_down
    return res
  end
  
  def bottom_up
    i = @node.size - 1
    v = @node[i]
    while i > 0
      parent = (i - 1) >> 1
      break if @node[parent] >= v
      
      swap(parent, i)
      i = parent
    end
    
    @node[i] = v
  end

  def top_down
    i = 0
    tmp = @node.pop
    while (i << 1) + 1 < @node.size
      lhs = (i << 1) + 1
      rhs = (i << 1) + 2
      m = lhs
      
      if rhs < @node.size && @node[lhs] < @node[rhs]
        m = rhs
      end
      
      break if @node[m] <= tmp
      @node[i] = @node[m]
      i = m
    end
    
    @node[i] = tmp unless @node.empty?
  end

  def swap(i, j)
    @node[i], @node[j] = @node[j], @node[i]
  end
end

class UnionFind
    def initialize(n)
        @have_node_num = Array.new(n, -1)
    end
    def findSet(x)
        return x if @have_node_num[x] < 0
        @have_node_num[x] = findSet(@have_node_num[x])
        return @have_node_num[x]
    end
    def link(x, y)
        return if x == y
        x, y = y, x if @have_node_num[x] > @have_node_num[y]
        @have_node_num[x] += @have_node_num[y]
        @have_node_num[y] = x
    end
    def unite(x, y)
        link(findSet(x), findSet(y))
    end
    def same(x, y)
        findSet(x) == findSet(y)
    end
    def size(idx)
        return -@have_node_num[findSet(idx)]
    end
end

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
  val sc = Scanner(System.`in`)
  val n = sc.nextInt()
  val a = (1..n).map { sc.nextInt() }


  val dis = mutableListOf<Int>()
  dis.add(Math.abs(a[0]))
  for (i in 0 until n-1) {
    val tmp = Math.abs(a[i+1] - a[i])
    dis.add(tmp)
  }
  dis.add(Math.abs(a[n-1]))

  val sum = dis.sum()

  val list = mutableListOf<Int>()
  list.add(0)
  list.addAll(a)
  list.add(0)

  val ans = mutableListOf<Int>()
  for (i in 1 until list.size - 1) {
    val pre = list[i-1]
    val now = list[i]
    val suf = list[i+1]

    val tmp = sum - Math.abs(now - pre) - Math.abs(suf - now) + Math.abs(suf - pre)
    ans.add(tmp)

  }

  println(ans.joinToString("\n"))

}

            if (t >> num)&1:

                break

        for j in range(1, 24):
            if ((t>>j)&1) == 0: continue
            ret = min(ret, j - prev)
            prev = j

        ret = min(ret, 24-prev)
        ans = max(ans, ret)
    print(ans)

import os

import numpy as np

# >>> binary indexed tree >>>
# +1  ndarray  1 

def bit_sum(bit, i):  # [bit_sum, "i8(i8[:],i8)"],
    # (0, i]
    res = 0
    while i:
        res += bit[i]
        i -= i & -i
    return res

def bit_add(bit, i, val):  # [bit_add, "void(i8[:],i8,i8)"],
    n = len(bit)
    while i < n:
        bit[i] += val
        i += i & -i

# <<< binary indexed tree <<<


def inversion_number(arr):  # [inversion_number, "i8(f8[:])"],
    # 
    n = len(arr)
    arr = np.argsort(arr) + 1
    bit = np.zeros(n+1, dtype=np.int64)
    res = n * (n-1) >> 1
    for val in arr:
        res -= bit_sum(bit, val)
        bit_add(bit, val, 1)
    return res

def solve(A, B, C):

        ng = 1e10
        n_iteration = 70
    else:
        ok = -1e4

        Y = (-A*x+C) / B
        inv_num = inversion_number(Y)
        if inv_num >= th:
            ok = x
        else:
            ng = x
    return ok

class PriorityQueue
    def initialize(arr)
        @size = arr.size
        @array = arr
        @array.unshift(nil)
        h = (@size / 2) | 0
        h.downto(1) do |i|
            maxHeapify(i)
        end
    end
    def getArray
        return @array[1..@size]
    end
    def maxHeapify(i)
        left = 2 * i
        right = 2 * i + 1
        largest = 0
        if left <= @size && @array[left] > @array[i]
            largest = left
        else
            largest = i
        end
        if right <= @size && @array[right] > @array[largest]
            largest = right
        end
        if largest != i
            @array[i], @array[largest] = @array[largest], @array[i]
            maxHeapify(largest)
        end
    end
    def pop
        return -(1<<29) if @size < 1
        maxv = @array[1]
        @array[1] = @array[@size]
        @size -= 1
        maxHeapify(1)
        maxv
    end
    def push(e)
        @size += 1
        i = @size
        @array[i] = -(1<<29)
        return if e < @array[i]
        @array[i] = e
        while i > 1 && @array[i/2] < @array[i]
            @array[i], @array[i/2] = @array[i/2], @array[i]
            i = i / 2
        end
    end
end

def check(max_length, left, right, r, index):
    if index == 1000:
        print(left)
        sys.exit()
    half = (left + right) / 2
    if 2 * half <= max_length * (r - half) / r:
        check(max_length, half, right, r, index + 1)
    else:
        check(max_length, left, half, r, index + 1)

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    val (N, X) = listOfInt()
    if (X == 1 || X == 2 * N - 1) { println("No"); return }
    println("Yes")
    val A = IntArray(2 * N - 1)
    A[N - 2] = X - 1; A[N - 1] = X; A[N] = X + 1
    val B = (1..2 * N - 1).toMutableList()
    B.removeAll(listOf<Int>(X - 1, X, X + 1))
    var b = 0
    for (n in 0 until N - 2) A[n] = B[b++]
    for (n in N + 1 until 2 * N - 1) A[n] = B[b++]
    println(A.joinToString(separator = " "))
}
